## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (`.editorconfig`)
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is well-commented, particularly in complex areas
- [ ] No new warnings introduced
- [ ] Nullable reference types properly handled

### Testing
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage is adequate
- [ ] Edge cases considered and tested

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Configuration examples updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated

### Architecture
- [ ] Follows clean architecture principles
- [ ] Uses Microsoft-first implementation policy (prefers built-in solutions)
- [ ] Dependency injection properly configured
- [ ] Async/await used appropriately

### Database (if applicable)
- [ ] EF Core migrations included
- [ ] Migration tested (up and down)
- [ ] Schema changes documented

### Build
- [ ] Builds successfully: `.\build\build.ps1 -Target Build`
- [ ] Tests pass: `.\build\build.ps1 -Target Test`
- [ ] No new build warnings
